00008 #ifndef ORDERSAFEPROCESSOR_H_
00009 #define ORDERSAFEPROCESSOR_H_
00010 
00011 
00012 #include "mt/common/OrderSafeProcessorHandler.h"
00013 
00014 
00015 namespace mt{
00016 
00017 
00018 template<class DataIn, class DataOut> class OrderSafeProcessor {
00019 
00020         mt::SmartPtr<OrderSafeProcessorInterface<DataIn, DataOut> > m_interface;
00021         uint32_t m_threadCount;
00022 
00023         uint32_t m_sn;
00024         Mutex m_snMtx;
00025 
00026         void (*m_overflowCallback)();
00027 
00028         Queue<std::pair<uint32_t, DataIn> > *m_inQueue;
00029         OrderSafeQueue<DataOut> *m_outQueue;
00030         std::vector<OrderSafeProcessorHandler<DataIn, DataOut>*> m_handlers;
00031 
00032         uint32_t getSn(){
00033                 AutoMutex a(m_snMtx);
00034                 return m_sn++;
00035 
00036         }
00037 
00038 protected:
00039         virtual mt::SmartPtr<OrderSafeProcessorInterface<DataIn, DataOut> > getInterface() {
00040                 MT_EXCEPTION_ASSERT(m_interface, "No interface in Order safe Processor");
00041                 return m_interface;
00042         }
00043 
00044 public:
00045   OrderSafeProcessor(uint32_t c = 1) {
00046                 m_threadCount = c;
00047                 m_inQueue = new Queue<std::pair<uint32_t, DataIn> >;
00048                 m_outQueue = new OrderSafeQueue<DataOut >;
00049                 m_sn = 0;
00050         }
00051 
00052         OrderSafeProcessor(mt::SmartPtr<OrderSafeProcessorInterface<DataIn, DataOut> > procInterface, uint32_t c = 1){
00053                 m_interface = procInterface;
00054                 m_threadCount = c;
00055                 m_inQueue = new Queue<std::pair<uint32_t, DataIn> >;
00056                 m_outQueue = new OrderSafeQueue<DataOut >;
00057                 m_sn = 0;
00058         }
00059         
00060         virtual ~OrderSafeProcessor() {
00061         }
00062 
00063         void start(){
00064 
00065                 for(uint32_t i = 0; i< m_threadCount; i++ ){
00066 
00067                         OrderSafeProcessorHandler<DataIn, DataOut> *handler = new OrderSafeProcessorHandler<DataIn, DataOut>;
00068                         handler->setInQueue(m_inQueue);
00069                         handler->setOutQueue(m_outQueue);
00070                         handler->setInterface(getInterface());
00071                         handler->start();
00072                         m_handlers.push_back(handler);
00073                 }
00074         }
00075         
00076         void enlargeOutputQueue(size_t sz){
00077                 m_outQueue->enlarge(sz);
00078         }
00079 
00080         void push(DataIn data){
00081                 m_inQueue->push(std::pair<uint32_t, DataIn> (getSn(), data));
00082 
00083         };
00084         DataOut pop(){
00085 
00086                 return m_outQueue->pop();
00087 
00088 
00089         };
00090 
00091 
00092         void registerOverflowWatchdog(void (*callback)()){
00093                 m_overflowCallback = callback;
00094         }
00095 
00096         void setOutpuQueueSize(size_t sz){
00097                 m_outQueue->resize(sz);
00098         }
00099 
00100 };

00103 
00104 }
